    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }

    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */

            "Pu",
            "BWP ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "hh:mm:ss",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
            "dd/MMMM/yy",
            "dd/MMMM/yy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }

            "Sun",
            "Mon",
            "Tue",
            "Wed",
            "Thu",
            "Fri",
            "Sat",
    }

            "Sunday",

            "Thursday",

            "Saturday",
    }

        Title { "English locale for Botswana" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "" }

        Telephone { "" }

        Territory { "Botswana" }

        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "Jan",

            "%",
            "0",
            "#",

    }
